house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1983 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) . Rooms include master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, skylights.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Great Room,Microwave, Skylights, Tennis Court(s)
